name: Factory 3310
description:
This is my entry for the NOKIA 3310 JAM 3 !
*
The optional theme is : ON / OFF so I created a game based on 6 switches. You have to carefully turn off and on these inputs to produce the highest amount of desired products!
*
But pay attention! 3 STRIKES and you are OUT!  [See the bottom right panel with the 3 dots ]
*
:::: RULES ::::
When you start the game,into the bottom left corner the system randomly pick a DESIRED TYPE of SHAPE. Your goal is to modify the receiving objects in order to be like the desired type. To do that, you have to Enable or Disable the 6 switches that activate the relative machines. 

:::: CONTROLS ::::

- press 1 to : Change shape from [ triangle ] to [ circle ]

- press 2 to : Change shape from [ square ] to [ circle ]

- press 3 to : Change shape from [ circle ] to [ triangle]

- press 4 to : Change shape from [ circle ] to [ square ]

- press 5 to : Fill the empty shapes

- press 6 to : Drain the filled shapes

PS: Remember to disable a switch if you don't need a change on the next object!!!
